title: THERE IS NO RULE OF LAW: ONLY THE DEITIES TO TAKE OUR GRIEVANCES: ANOMA
content: Today, there is no rule of law in the country. Only the deities are left to take our grievances, says Anoma Fonseka, wife of former Army Commander Sarath Fonseka. She made this statement yesterday taking part in a pooja held at the Kali Amma Kovil in Mutwal to mark the completion of a year since…
